member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.AcquisitionDate

member.remarks: Will often be blank

member.remarks: Will often be blank

member.remarks: Will often be blank

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.CreatorID
member.summary: Logon name of the user when the file was created

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.InstFlags
member.remarks: Values should be one of the constants in InstFlags

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.InstMethods
member.remarks: Typically only have one instrument method; the length of this array defines the number of instrument methods

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.InstrumentDescription
member.remarks: Typically only defined for instruments converted from other formats

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.TuneMethods
member.remarks: Typically have one or two tune methods; the length of this array defines the number of tune methods defined

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.RawFileInfo.CorruptFile
member.remarks: Auto-set to true if the file is corrupt / has no data

member.summary: Reset all data in the struct

member.summary: List of mass ranges monitored by the first quadrupole

member.summary: Event Number: 1 for parent-ion scan, >1 for fragmentation scans (in order)

member.summary: If this is a Selected Ion Monitoring scan

member.summary: If this is a zoom scan

member.summary: Activation type, determined from the filter string

member.name: T:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType
member.summary: Type for storing Parent Ion Information

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType.MSLevel
member.remarks: 1 for MS1 spectra, 2 for MS2, 3 for MS3

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType.CollisionMode
member.remarks: Examples: cid, etd, hcd, EThcD, ETciD

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType.CollisionMode2
member.remarks: For example, for filter string: ITMS + c NSI r d sa Full ms2 1143.72@etd120.55@cid20.00 [120.00-2000.00] CollisionMode = ETciD CollisionMode2 = cid

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType.CollisionEnergy2
member.remarks: For example, for filter string: ITMS + c NSI r d sa Full ms2 1143.72@etd120.55@cid20.00 [120.00-2000.00] CollisionEnergy = 120.55 CollisionEnergy2 = 20.0

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType.ActivationType
member.remarks: Examples: CID, ETD, or HCD

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType.ToString
member.summary: Return a simple summary of the object

member.summary: Type for storing FT Label Information

member.summary: High-energy Collision-induce Dissociation (psi-ms: beam-type collision-induced dissociation)

member.summary: Multiple SIM ranges in a single scan

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.MRMScanTypeConstants.SRM
member.summary: Monitoring a parent ion and one or more daughter ions

member.name: F:ThermoRawFileReader.MRMScanTypeConstants.SIM
member.summary: Selected Ion Monitoring (SIM), which is MS1 of a limited m/z range

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.DetermineMRMScanType(System.String)
member.summary: Determines the MRM scan type by parsing the scan filter string
member.returns: MRM scan type enum

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.DetermineIonizationMode(System.String)
member.summary: Determine the Ionization mode by parsing the scan filter string

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.ExtractMRMMasses(System.String,ThermoRawFileReader.MRMScanTypeConstants,ThermoRawFileReader.MRMInfo@)
member.summary: Parse out the MRM_QMS or SRM mass info from filterText
member.param: Output: MRM info class
member.remarks: We do not parse mass information out for Full Neutral Loss scans

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.ExtractParentIonMZFromFilterText(System.String,System.Double@)
member.summary: Parse out the parent ion from filterText
member.param: Parent ion m/z (output)
member.returns: True if success
member.remarks: If multiple parent ion m/z values are listed then parentIonMz will have the last one. However, if the filter text contains "Full msx" then parentIonMz will have the first parent ion listed

This was created for use in other programs that only need the parent ion m/z, and no other functions from ThermoRawFileReader. Other projects that use this: PHRPReader
To copy this, take the code from this function, plus the regex strings and , with their uses in and

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.ExtractParentIonMZFromFilterText(System.String,System.Double@,System.Int32@,System.String@)
member.summary: Parse out the parent ion and collision energy from filterText
member.param: Parent ion m/z (output)
MSLevel (output)
Collision mode (output)
member.returns: True if success
member.remarks: If multiple parent ion m/z values are listed then parentIonMz will have the last one. However, if the filter text contains "Full msx" then parentIonMz will have the first parent ion listed

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.ExtractParentIonMZFromFilterText(System.String,System.Double@,System.Int32@,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{ThermoRawFileReader.udtParentIonInfoType}@)
member.summary: Parse out the parent ion and collision energy from filterText
member.param: Parent ion m/z (output)
MSLevel (output)
Collision mode (output)
Output: parent ion list
member.returns: True if success
member.remarks: If multiple parent ion m/z values are listed then parentIonMz will have the last one. However, if the filter text contains "Full msx" then parentIonMz will have the first parent ion listed

member.summary: Extract the MS Level from the filter string

member.summary: Number of scans in the .raw file

member.summary: Get the header info for the specified scan

Scan header info class
member.returns: True if no error, False if an error

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanTypeNameFromFinniganScanFilterText(System.String)
member.summary: Parse the scan type name out of the scan filter string

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.MakeGenericFinniganScanFilter(System.String)
member.summary: Remove scan-specific data from a scan filter string; primarily removes the parent ion m/z and the scan m/z range

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.ValidateMSScan(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Boolean@,ThermoRawFileReader.MRMScanTypeConstants@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Examines filterText to validate that it is a supported MS1 scan type (MS, SIM, or MRMQMS, or SRM scan)
member.param: True if mrmScanType is SIM or MRMQMS
member.returns: True if filterText contains a known MS scan type
member.remarks: Returns false for MSn scans (like ms2 or ms3)

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanData(System.Int32,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity list for the specified scan
member.param: Scan number
Output array of mass values
Output array of intensity values (parallel to mzList)
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanData(System.Int32,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity list for the specified scan
member.param: Scan number
Output array of mass values
Output array of intensity values (parallel to mzList)
Set to 0 (or negative) to return all of the data
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanData(System.Int32,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: Scan number
Output array of mass values
Output array of intensity values (parallel to mzList)
Set to 0 (or negative) to return all of the data
True to centroid the data, false to return as-is (either profile or centroid, depending on how the data was acquired)
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanData2D(System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: 2D array where the first dimension is 0 for mass or 1 for intensity while the second dimension is the data point index
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanData2D(System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: 2D array where the first dimension is 0 for mass or 1 for intensity while the second dimension is the data point index
Maximum number of data points; 0 to return all data
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanData2D(System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: 2D array where the first dimension is 0 for mass or 1 for intensity while the second dimension is the data point index
Maximum number of data points; 0 to return all data
True to centroid the data, false to return as-is (either profile or centroid, depending on how the data was acquired)
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanLabelData(System.Int32,ThermoRawFileReader.udtFTLabelInfoType[]@)
member.summary: Gets the scan label data for an FTMS-tagged scan
member.param: Scan number
List of mass, intensity, resolution, baseline intensity, noise floor, and charge for each data point
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.XRawFileIO.GetScanPrecisionData(System.Int32,ThermoRawFileReader.udtMassPrecisionInfoType[]@)
member.summary: Gets scan precision data for FTMS data (resolution of each data point)
member.param: List of Intensity, Mass, AccuracyMMU, AccuracyPPM, and Resolution for each data point
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: This returns a subset of the data thatGetScanLabelData does, but with 2 additional fields.

member.summary: UTC Time that this scan info was cached

member.summary: Constructor with scan number and data in a udtScanHeaderInfoType struct

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.StoreScanEvents(System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Store this scan's scan events using a parallel string arrays

member.summary: Store this scan's scan events using a parallel string arrays

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.TryGetScanEvent(System.String,System.String@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the event value associated with the given scan event name
member.param: Event name to find
Event value
Set to true to match the start of an event name, and not require a full match
member.returns: True if found a match for the event name, otherwise false
member.remarks: Event names nearly always end in a colon, e.g. "Monoisotopic M/Z:" or "Charge State:"

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.ToString
member.summary: Overridden ToString(): Displays a short summary of this object

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.CacheDateUTC
member.summary: UTC Time that this scan info was cached
member.remarks: Used for determining which cached scan info can be discarded if too many scans become cached

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.MSLevel
member.returns: MS acquisition level, where 1 means MS, 2 means MS/MS, 3 means MS^3 aka MS/MS/MS

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.EventNumber
member.returns: 1 for parent-ion scan; 2 for 1st frag scan, 3 for 2nd frag scan, etc.

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.SIMScan
member.returns: True if this is a selected ion monitoring (SIM) scan (i.e. a small mass range is being examined)
member.remarks: If multiple selected ion ranges are examined simultaneously, then this will be false but MRMScanType will be .MRMQMS

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.MRMScanType
member.returns: 1 or 2 if this is a multiple reaction monitoring scan (MRMQMS or SRM)

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.ZoomScan
member.returns: True when the given scan is a zoomed in mass region
member.remarks: These spectra are typically skipped when creating SICs

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.NumPeaks
member.summary: Number of mass intensity value pairs
member.returns: Number of points, -1 if unknown

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.TotalIonCurrent
member.returns: Sum of all ion abundances

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.BasePeakMZ
member.returns: m/z value of the most abundant ion in the scan

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.BasePeakIntensity
member.returns: Intensity of the most abundant ion in the scan

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.ActivationType
member.summary: Activation type (aka activation method) as reported by the reader

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.CollisionMode
member.summary: Collision mode, determined from the filter string
member.remarks: Typically CID, ETD, HCD, EThcD, or ETciD

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.UniformTime
member.summary: Indicates whether the sampling time increment for the controller is constant

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.Frequency
member.summary: Sampling frequency for the current controller

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.IsCentroided
member.returns: True if centroid (sticks) scan; False if profile (continuum) scan

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.IsFTMS
member.returns: True if acquired on a high resolution mass analyzer (for example, on an Orbitrap or Q-Exactive)

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.ScanEvents
member.returns: List of key/value pairs

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReader.clsScanInfo.StatusLog
member.returns: List of key/value pairs
